featured.text: It all depends on whether you think it is worth the effort.
Next time, being thin will finally fulfill its promise of everlasting happiness, self-worth, and, of course, love.

It’s an admirable project, and it is worth finding out if a similar one operates in your hometown.

definition.en_def: The value of something; deserving of something.
definition.example: This painting is worth a lot of money.
